name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: diagnosis_VCF_osteoporotic
description: Diagnosis of osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture (VCF)

name: VCF_advanced_imaging_bone_marrow_edema_MRI
description: Documentation of bone marrow edema on MRI for VCF

name: VCF_advanced_imaging_bone_scan_SPECT_CT_uptake
description: Documentation of bone-scan/SPECT/CT uptake for VCF

name: diagnosis_code_ICD10
description: Relevant ICD-10 diagnosis codes for VCF (specific codes located in companion article)

name: procedure_PVA
description: Percutaneous Vertebral Augmentation (PVA)

name: procedure_PVP
description: Percutaneous Vertebroplasty (PVP), a type of PVA

name: procedure_PKP
description: Kyphoplasty (PKP), a type of PVA

name: procedure_code_CPT
description: Covered CPT codes for percutaneous vertebral augmentation procedures: 22510, 22511, 22512, 22513, 22514, 22515

name: VCF_acuity_acute_duration_weeks
description: Duration of acute osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture (VCF) in weeks (less than 6)

name: VCF_acuity_subacute_duration_weeks
description: Duration of subacute osteoporotic vertebral compression fracture (VCF) in weeks (6 to 12)

name: VCF_location_T1_L5
description: Vertebral compression fracture located between T1 and L5

name: pain_severity_NRS_hospitalized
description: Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) pain score threshold for hospitalized patients (greater than or equal to 8)

name: pain_severity_VAS_hospitalized
description: Visual Analog Scale (VAS) pain score threshold for hospitalized patients (greater than or equal to 8)

name: pain_severity_NRS_non_hospitalized
description: Numeric Rating Scale (NRS) pain score threshold for non-hospitalized patients (greater than or equal to 5)

name: pain_severity_VAS_non_hospitalized
description: Visual Analog Scale (VAS) pain score threshold for non-hospitalized patients (greater than or equal to 5)

name: non_surgical_management_failed
description: Optimal non-surgical management (NSM) has failed

name: VCF_pain_worsening
description: Worsening pain related to VCF

name: vertebral_body_height_loss_progression
description: Progression of vertebral body height loss

name: vertebral_body_height_reduction_percentage
description: Percentage of vertebral body height reduction (greater than 25%)

name: kyphotic_deformity
description: Presence of kyphotic deformity

name: VCF_impact_daily_functioning_RDQ_score
description: Roland Morris Disability Questionnaire (RDQ) score indicating severe impact of VCF on daily functioning (greater than 17)

name: current_back_pain_not_VCF_primary
description: Current back pain is not primarily due to identified acute or subacute VCF(s)

name: osteomyelitis_present
description: Presence of osteomyelitis

name: discitis_present
description: Presence of discitis

name: active_systemic_infection_present
description: Presence of active systemic infection

name: active_surgical_site_infection_present
description: Presence of active surgical site infection

name: pregnancy_status
description: Patient is pregnant

name: vertebral_fractures_per_procedure_count_greater_than
description: Number of vertebral fractures per procedure (greater than 3) as a relative contraindication

name: allergy_bone_cement_present
description: Allergy to bone cement

name: allergy_opacification_agents_present
description: Allergy to opacification agents

name: uncorrected_coagulopathy_present
description: Presence of uncorrected coagulopathy

name: spinal_instability_present
description: Presence of spinal instability

name: myelopathy_from_fracture_present
description: Presence of myelopathy from the fracture

name: neurologic_deficit_present
description: Presence of neurologic deficit

name: neural_impingement_present
description: Presence of neural impingement

name: fracture_retropulsion_canal_compromise_present
description: Presence of fracture retropulsion/canal compromise

name: BMD_evaluation_referred
description: Patient referred for evaluation of Bone Mineral Density (BMD)

name: osteoporosis_education_referred
description: Patient referred for osteoporosis education

name: osteoporosis_prevention_treatment_program_participation
description: Patient instructed to participate in an osteoporosis prevention/treatment program

name: non_operative_medical_therapy_duration_hours
description: Brief duration of nonoperative medical therapy required before PVA consideration (e.g., 24 hours)

name: medical_therapy_failed_window_weeks
description: Duration of failed medical therapy for acute VCFs (less than 3 weeks)

name: opioid_taper_or_transition_window_days
description: Window for patient to taper parenteral opioids or transition to oral opioids after admission (7 days)
